We are your customers from Hong Kong. It is regrettable to see your Hong Kong agency decided to advertise on the Pro-Beijing TV Station TVB again, as your company promised that Hongkongese would not see Choya's advertisement on TVB after 23rd February 2020.

As we mentioned last year, TVB often reports biased or fake news in favor of the Chinese Communist Party (CCP) and the Hong Kong Government to mislead audiences. Therefore, advertise on TVB is no different from agreeing their behavior. Now, Hongkongese have no choice but to boycott Choya's product until further explanation from Choya. We look forward to your reply.
